mapper.insert: insert into ecs_chat_customer (cus_id, user_id, of_username, cus_name, supp_id, cus_type, session_count, talk_time, cus_degree, cus_enable, add_time) values (#{cusId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ofUsername,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cusName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{suppId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cusType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sessionCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{talkTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cusDegree,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cusEnable,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{addTime,jdbcType=INTEGER})

mapper.select: select cus_id, user_id, of_username, cus_name, supp_id, cus_type, session_count, talk_time, cus_degree, cus_enable, add_time from ecs_chat_customer where cus_id = #{cusId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
